member_organisations: 130,000 members, 96 local branches with 1,700 voluntiers, a board consisting of 12 members and a central administration with 60 employees.
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Biodiversity Strategy 2020, Green Infrastructure Strategy, No Net Loss Initiative, Fitnesscheck of the Habitats Directive and Birds Directive, Act on Invasive Alien Species, implementation of the Water Framework Directive and Marine Strategy Framework Directive, BREF, Strategy on Climate Change, Directive on Waste, EAP.
organisation_name: The Danish Society for Nature Conservation (DN)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:

relevant_communication: Public surveys and consultations, complaints, campaigns, contacts and meetings with MEPs and staff.
